nodes.text: The Morganians were a species of slender, white-skinned Humanoids. They had pointed ears and were renowned for their beauty.

Leland Chee, on the StarWars.com Message Boards, stated that his theory is that "all pointy-eared species are either Sephi or closely related to Sephi." Note that he answered this when asked about Valenthyne Farfalla's species, who had equine features, including hooves.
